X1.name: Soul of Sword
X1.description: Sharp sword qi covered by soft moonlight. When the soft and strong meet, a powerful relic is born.

X2.name: Millenary Dream
X2.description: Waking up from a millenary dream, the swords exude an aura of solemnity. Only the one proven worthy can wield them.

X3.name: Dual Swords
X3.description: Edges brightening as snow, tassels flowing like stars, when the dual swords combine, the world shall be shaken.

X4.name: Nebula Dual
X4.description: It's said that when the swords were drawn, rainbows will surge in the sky.

X5.name: Guqin Sound
X5.description: Melodious sound flows out from the guqin. The notes, like butterflies, hover their wings and dance in the wind.

X6.name: Decadant Music
X6.description: A thousand of guqins in a thousand people's eyes because it appears differently to different people.

X7.name: Stringless Sound
X7.description: People in Cloud believe that the most powerful guqin can be enchanting. It's called Stringless Sound.

X8.name: Stringless Guqin
X8.description: The reason it is called the Stringless Guqin is that it is played using spirit and heart.

X9.name: Newborn Feather
X9.description: I'm a lonely little feather floating in a water blue dream. When can I wake up from the dream and start a new life?

X10.name: Dawn Hatchling
X10.description: I grow up in the Tower of Zen but I also want to see the world outside. That man seems lonely. I'll go with him.

X11.name: Blue Messenger
X11.description: The man gave me to his beloved niece as a gift. Every time she gazes into the sky, I feel so close to her heart.

X12.name: Blue Phoenix's Letter
X12.description: Dear master, I've grown up. No matter how far I travel, I remember the road home and take the message back.

X13.name: Glory Soul
X13.description: Orlando carries with him many marvelous inventions. They are all Flynn's works back in Federal Military Academy.

X14.name: Glory Medal
X14.description: This badge has a built-in GPS that tracks your trace all the time, and the sapphire is actually a camera.

X15.name: Glory Pen
X15.description: This pen can function as a recorder and the ink in the holder is deadly poisonous.

X16.name: Glory Umbrella
X16.description: This umbrella consists of canopy made of bullet-proof fabric and a mini electromagnetic gun disguised as the pole.

X17.name: Lonely Years
X17.description: Years passed and I get used to loneliness. Then you broke in the quiet manor, lighting up the fire in my heart.

X18.name: Lonely Drink
X18.description: I believe in you, but the seal is collapsing, I don't know how long I can stand...

X19.name: Vintage Entanglement
X19.description: Breaking the chain, I took the first step in the world outside. I will travel alone and find you.

X20.name: Victory Wine
X20.description: May this happy reunion always stay in our hearts. Let's make the covenant once again, a bond of loyalty.

X21.name: Hare and March
X21.description: I'm March Hare, not because I'll get mad in March but I was born on a sunny afternoon in March long long ago.

X22.name: Hare and Secret
X22.description: I have a magical pocket watch which can take me to anyone's dream. Yes, I'm a hare who knows lots of secrets!

X23.name: Hare and Dream
X23.description: Although I've wandered through different dreams, I've never had one myself, what's the feeling of dreaming?

X24.name: Hare and Destiny
X24.description: You want to know what does the one you like dreamed last night? Give me a carrot, I might consider telling you!

X25.name: Spirit of Magic
X25.description: It's said that only the most innocent child can see the Illusion Elf. I see you now. Am I the most innocent one?

X26.name: Book of Dreams
X26.description: Oh magic book, can you make me a candy castle? Sweet candies, delicious chocolates, and also marshmallow bunnies!

X27.name: Star Moon Covenant
X27.description: The magic covenant has been signed when I see you. Magic mark on the souls now. We'll be together forever!

X28.name: Star Magic Circle
X28.description: The hexagram I wove with moonlight and love is shining in the dark. Where are you? Here? Or in my heart?

X29.name: Primal Bow
X29.description: Crafted by the first wood elf, its power and appearance vary among different wielders.

X30.name: Retribution Arrow
X30.description: When the young Chloris first gained the Ice Flame Bow, elegant engravings appear on the bow.

X31.name: Sunk Feather
X31.description: Chloris spent a great amount of time meditating but still cannot awaken the Ice Flame Bow. He's confused and upset.

X32.name: Ice Flame Bow
X32.description: Watered by his tears, the bow awakens and releases arrows which break time and space. There he sees Floral.

X33.name: Spirit of Time
X33.description: Nothing is longer than time, because it never ends; nothing is shorter than time, because it's always too late

X34.name: Childlike Magic
X34.description: Young Yvette always falls asleep holding her wand. She dreams that one day mum's wand will bring her to happiness.

X35.name: Momentary Wand
X35.description: Time may change the face, but not the heart and affection. Like the sun, hope will always shine upon us.

X36.name: Wand of Time
X36.description: When time flies backward, we sometimes want the magic of time relapse... But we gain strength in memory.

X37.name: Twin Serenade
X37.description: It's fated that we can not talk when we are awake, but I can feel your song through my silver tiara.

X38.name: Wood Elves' Ballad
X38.description: We elves are the guardian of the forest. As a duty, you sing the regal ballad.

X39.name: Century Symphony
X39.description: After centuries of sleep, he suddenly appears in my life. The laughter and tears are a symphony in my blood.

X40.name: Diamond Aria
X40.description: Wood elf's dormant chant once again infuses into the holy gem. It's a story of forgiving and waiting

X41.name: Spirit of Illusion
X41.description: Ever since I was conscious, I can create illusions. Power, fortune, or beauty, I can give you everything

X42.name: Reflection of Truth
X42.description: I'm just a mirror, but I'm unpredictable. I love reality, so I'll never conceal anything from you.

X43.name: Mirror of Illusion
X43.description: I'm just a mirror, people see themselves in me. I can reveal your deepest lust and delusion...

X44.name: Mirror of Forest
X44.description: I'm just a mirror. I can both reflect reality and create illusions. I named myself Eli when I was deserted.

X45.name: Deer's Whisper
X45.description: On the Mount Mango, a deer holds a flower in its mouth, with a boy listening to the sound of willows.

X46.name: Deer and Willow
X46.description: Nature gives the deer a nimble body and bright eyes. And the boy studies from the beauty of nature.

X47.name: Deer and Brook
X47.description: Beauty is never fixed and you should always follow your heart. After a talk, the deer's eyes were opened.

X48.name: Deer and Cliff
X48.description: The season may change, but flowers will bloom if there is spring in your heart. The boy never forgets this place.

X49.name: Cat Says · Vagrancy
X49.description: I'm a black cat with lapis lazuli colored eyes. Many praised the color of my eyes, but only she took me home.

X50.name: Cat Says · Encounter
X50.description: When I was abandoned, I thought I would never see that shy girl again. Until I met Mr. Mindless and Mr. Unhappy.

X51.name: Cat Says · Afternoon
X51.description: Actually Mr. Mindless is smart and Mr. Unhappy is happy. Meow, Nina smiles. I'll make fun of Mr. Mindless today.

X52.name: Cat Says · Time
X52.description: They won't stay with me in the afternoon. I know it but I just cannot help waiting on the windowsill.

X53.name: Snow on Begonia
X53.description: At the beginning of February, snow falls quietly. The little begonia sapling stands firm in the wind.

X54.name: Reflection of Begonia
X54.description: The color is washed away, leaving her pure white flowers behind. The little child was outlining begonia with ink.

X55.name: Lovesick Begonia
X55.description: Emotions stir deep in her heart. Under the begonia tree, she only thinks of the war in the North.

X56.name: Night Begonia
X56.description: It's the 23rd summer, the begonia still blooms as always, but the road home seems endless.

X57.name: Ivy in the Manor
X57.description: Full of energy, Mount Mango is a place immortals always visit. But hidden in the mist, it's secret to common people

X58.name: Grass Basket
X58.description: Time seems to forget this place. Liang Jing and the boy spent the whole summer enjoying the scenery here.

X59.name: Rattan Case
X59.description: Years later when the boy and Liang Jing meet again, both their hearts and faces are like before.

X60.name: Willow Casket
X60.description: I was lost in Mant Mango and when I returned home, the green yard there is dilapidated.

X61.name: Night Prelude
X61.description: In the midsummer night, dreamy dance shines in the girl's eyes and prelude comes out from the case.

X62.name: Toy March
X62.description: In the noisy courtyard, the metal clockwork is wound and the machine starts playing a march of toys.

X63.name: Cliff Polka
X63.description: A stubborn girl was dancing alone at the cliff. The skirt hemline brought about the ruby polka.

X64.name: Stardust Waltz
X64.description: The stardusts are blue and deep. On the warm palm, our past is sealed. Listen, the bell rings the waltz of fate.

X65.name: Sugar Kiss
X65.description: As my illusion was broken like a sugar coating, I tasted the flavor of growth.

X66.name: Fondant Bow
X66.description: Cream lace with raspberries, this is Yvette's favorite hairpin! The actress of Raspberry Princess has the same one

X67.name: Raspberry Mousse
X67.description: The rabbit plate rack looks familiar. Perhaps it's a real rabbit? Hush—let's pretend we didn't notice.

X68.name: Fairy Tale Tea
X68.description: Lace tablecloth, rich black tea, and perfect dessert tower. Wear your favorite dress and be a part of the fairy tale

X69.name: Scales of Blues
X69.description: In the foggy town, pentatonic scale comes from a window with a beautiful chord like the sigh of a poet.

X70.name: Sad Jazz
X70.description: Jazz is a sad song served in a cup in the dim light. The drunk, holding her broken dream, is waiting for the dawn

X71.name: Wordless Song
X71.description: When she wakes up, everything is buried in the dusty attic. Oblivion is a lock without key

X72.name: Saxophone Poem
X72.description: The kid with the saxophone on her back looked back. She would forget everything: Name, Tears, Hatred... and Sin.

X73.name: Ambition
X73.description: When he was young, he was a scholar. When war broke out, he enlisted in the army.

X74.name: Copper Fish Tally
X74.description: His heart is as hard as his armor. He swears to recover the lost city so that the dead will not die in vain.

X75.name: General's Order
X75.description: The well-trained army now awaits. He is talented both in making schemes in the camp and fighting on the frontline.

X76.name: Phoenix Sword
X76.description: Fearlessly, he charges. He wields the swords ruthlessly like the frost and elegantly like the phoenix

X77.name: Orchid Leaf
X77.description: The flower is sweet and the leaf is slender. The ambitious 18-year-old young man is in the capital alone.

X78.name: Red Bean Seed
X78.description: Red bean is the token of lovesickness. In January last year, we met in the snow and fell at first sight

X79.name: Willow Twig
X79.description: When the willow withers and flowers fall, will you be back? Willow is the symbol of separation.

X80.name: Orchid Under Moon
X80.description: Like the lofty orchid, at the age of 25, the boy enlisted in the army to serve his country

X81.name: Memory Spark
X81.description: Kimi's childhood promise is carved in time. She's been learning to grow up and protecting the memories.

X82.name: Flickering Meteor
X82.description: Lit sparkler and you'll have a star in your hands. Once the light fades, will you remember the happiness?

X83.name: Snowy Night Sakura
X83.description: Kimi saw these spherical fireworks for the first time in a photo at home. They lit up the smile of her parents.

X84.name: Time Flower Rain
X84.description: She walked to her father with a trophy in the fireworks. Time never stops. She had no choice but to go forward.

X85.name: Nice Tune
X85.description: Zhu Yuxian used to hear tweedle in his dreams when he was young. It sounded sad but he couldn't understand.

X86.name: Bamboo Whistle
X86.description: As time flies, no songs can be heard in the Zhu Palace. Only a few chirps of birds left with a waning moon.

X87.name: Jade Flute
X87.description: When Ming Shuiyuan walks out of the Mansion Voyage Moon, it's deep night, but she is stopped by a sad flute.

X88.name: Phoenix Flute
X88.description: The flute lingers on the snow-covered branch then fades away under misty moonlight. The Mansion is now empty.

X89.name: Beginning of a Long Night
X89.description: At 6, Louie owned his first knight spear. Why do we have to fight? You'll know when you grow up, said Master Lionel

X90.name: Starry Night Goggles
X90.description: At 14, Louie left Black Water City and became a mercenary. He wants to fight for his faith.

X91.name: Windy Night Helmet
X91.description: At 17, Louie came to Cloud, a place he never saw. Vast flower field, warm sunshine, and that girl who saved him.

X92.name: Dark Night Motor
X92.description: At 24, Louie wore the white robe of Nameless Order and held the knight spear, leaving Bluebird and the past behind

X93.name: Chain Broken
X93.description: Yue's skills were taught by her parents, though her father said if possible, he would not give his glaive to her.

X94.name: Black Iron Edge
X94.description: When Yue Qianshuang first took the short blade from her father, it's so heavy that she didn't like it.

X95.name: Wind and Thunder Sword
X95.description: The glaive was the last thing Father gave her. When she first saw death, she knew the meaning of this weapon.

X96.name: Snow Sword
X96.description: Yue carefully cleans the weapon. Today she's just as sharp as it is. She'll kill carnage and protect the peace.

X97.name: Trail of Stars
X97.description: The star identifier records that nebulas reflect light through prism in the distant universe.

X98.name: Stars Prism
X98.description: It's said that everyone has a star. Some people's fates are on track, while others' are lost in the mist.

X99.name: Quiet Sky
X99.description: The star identifier developed by Flynn and Orlando is kept in the observatory of Federal Military Academy.

X100.name: Nebula Illustrations
X100.description: Before graduation, Flynn and Orlando recorded the starry night as a souvenir. Orlando made them an album later

X101.name: Blue Sky Chant
X101.description: Bai Yongxi grew up in book piles and showed great talent since young. People put high expectation on him.

X102.name: Mountain and River Volume
X102.description: However, the young king got tired of the pedantic atmosphere in the capital. He set off for the world outside.

X103.name: Agelong Volume
X103.description: Later, Jinjin received a letter from her brother, 'You will never know this world until you see it for yourself.'

X104.name: Morning Cloud Volume
X104.description: Years of history are gone like a dream. All the great dynasties left nothing but the words on the books.

X105.name: Time in the Forest
X105.description: The dwarfs live in Pigeon Forest and like everything here… But some of them want to see the outside world.

X106.name: Remember the Moment
X106.description: The dwarfs are good at making jewelry. Their works are exquisite and delicate but also easily neglected in styling.

X107.name: Recall the Past
X107.description: Debbie is a special kid. She prefers clothes to jewelry. She likes reading books under trees.

X108.name: Blue Clock
X108.description: No one loves Pigeon Forest more than Debbie. That's why she has to leave here before she becomes a great designer.

X109.name: Destined Twins
X109.description: Every generation, elves will have 2 guardians who protect the Pigeon Forest in turn, a Sword and a Moon.

X110.name: Dream Awakening
X110.description: Chloris is the first guardian and Lakris didn't appear under the Life Tree till Elf Queen went missing.

X111.name: Crescent and Flowers
X111.description: Chloris and Lakris cannot get to see each other, but they are connected through the fate mark.

X112.name: Dawn Harp
X112.description: When Lakris is asleep, he can tell from the harp by Chloris that everything is ok in Pigeon Forest.

X113.name: Dream of Puppet
X113.description: I dreamed that I lost my will like a puppet and what's left is only fake bubbles and broken faith.

X114.name: Hope Badge
X114.description: I cannot be trapped in yesterday's sorrow. I have to bury the pain and say farewell to the old times.

X115.name: Lonely Doll
X115.description: I cannot talk or listen, I can feel no joy or sadness. I can only stuff the nightmare into my belly with the cotton

X116.name: Shimmer in the Box
X116.description: Light casts in through the seam. I thought it could be hope, but as days pass by, there are silent nights only

X117.name: Bear Phantom
X117.description: The story of Renieve white bears is very popular. The girls who get to see it will win love in the next year.

X118.name: Pearl Bear
X118.description: A magician gave Bobo a little bear bag strung by pearls. There's a candy lay in it every time it opened.

X119.name: Stardream Bear
X119.description: Two little bears came to Bobo and put stars into her arms. The shimmering starlight reminds her 14th birthday.

X120.name: Guardian Bear
X120.description: In countless dreams, Bobo puts her head on the white bear's chest. Its embrace is as warm as her father's.

X125.name: Infinity Contraption
X125.description: From a gadget in the pocket to the huge city walls, Clan Ming's contraption skills cannot be matched.

X126.name: Trinket Lock
X126.description: The Clan holds the principle of defense over offense, but Ming Shuiyuan still goes to quell the southern rebellion.

X127.name: Fog Barrier
X127.description: Covered by the fog, the mech army captured the thirteen rebellious cities in a blink.

X128.name: Ocean Scale
X128.description: The sophisticated machine of wood assumes the shape of Xuan Wu; Snake is its sword and the turtle is its armor.

X133.name: Breath of Ice
X133.description: In the north, it is always snowing, leaving the snowy mountains in deep quiet.

X134.name: Frozen Sea
X134.description: Instead of identity, the knight spirit is a deep belief. Even deeply frozen, it will never fall.

X135.name: Wanderer in Snow
X135.description: The snow cannot disturb the peace on the snowfield, but the fire war can.

X136.name: Polar Traveler
X136.description: As peace fades away, so does the knight spirit. Abandon the name so that faith and home can be protected.

X137.name: Original Will
X137.description: Looking at the uncut satin evolves into gorgeous clothes under the spotlight always touches her.

X138.name: First Voice
X138.description: Carefully takes down the first evening dress and plays the first note of the movement. The girl's dance here begins.

X139.name: Dream Journey
X139.description: Wears beloved high heels on the velvet stool. This girl's battle gear will secure the victory on the new journey.

X140.name: Promise of Future
X140.description: Dress up before the mirror and follow the unicorn into that halo of the dream.

X141.name: Childhood reminiscence
X141.description: Childhood is a magnificent fantasy land, and I hope to wander in it and never have to experience separation.

X142.name: Carefree Dream
X142.description: Hanging in a colorful dream, reminiscing carefree childhood, she smiled in a midnight sleep.

X143.name: Romantic flower language
X143.description: The cute cat puppet dressed up as a bouquet is the most memorable birthday present she has ever received.

X144.name: Sunflower blossom
X144.description: Open the umbrella and take a family photo. Let the smile freeze on the photo. Let the memory last forever.

X145.name: Chapters of Epic
X145.description: All the stories begin with an adventure. The world is spinning and life changes at this moment.

X146.name: Miracle freeze frame
X146.description: I have met many friends and experienced twists and turns. Every important moment became an unforgettable memory.

X147.name: Wings of dreams
X147.description: She once cried in the dark night, she once hovered in the mist, but a brave heart can never be chained by the fate.

X148.name: Great era
X148.description: Bury the past with silence. Weave the future with dreams. Write the poems of times on the fertile soil of miracles.

X149.name: Memory Corridor
X149.description: Memory is a long and dreary corridor. It doesn't seem to end and there are dangers everywhere.

X150.name: Clutched Tight
X150.description: He stands before the window, the city lights reflected in his eyes. People would kill for his money.

X151.name: Wedge of Darkness
X151.description: The number 7 reagent is put in the suitcase as the peculiar trade is carried out. He savors the tension in the air.

X152.name: Sonic Shadow
X152.description: When speed is raised to the limit, body and soul seem to separate. The sensation from this tear is intoxicating.

X153.name: Nascent Dream
X153.description: The aroma of the rose can be smelled in the spring breeze. It opens up softly, within it a crystallized dream.

X154.name: Rosy Poetry
X154.description: Fierce winds couldn't blow it away; rainstorms couldn't damage its beauty. It quietly strives towards the dream.

X155.name: Immaculate Crown
X155.description: The land basks in the sun. It hears the cries of praise. Amidst the praises, it flaunts its petals.

X156.name: Holy Scepter
X156.description: Even the most beautiful flower will die to a gale. But autumn is still far away, so cherish its beauty while it lasts.

X157.name: Cry of the Crow
X157.description: She once saw the dawn at the mountaintop. A golden light came from the sky, which could make everything silent.

X158.name: Key of the Universe
X158.description: Behind the mechanism was a mysterious universe, huge and profound. The door to another world had never been opened.

X159.name: Crossbow of the Thought
X159.description: She always focused on what she was doing. Once she had set her goal, she would go forward without turning back.

X160.name: Feather of the Lonely Bird
X160.description: Has the general in the play turned into a bird, flying over the mountains and rivers, seeing the prosperous world?

X161.name: Early Winter Whisper
X161.description: Legend has it that the winter in the Pigeon Forest is so cold that the Dwarves have to pray together for survival.

X162.name: Winter Rebirth
X162.description: Everything sleeps when the cold comes, but new hope is breeding under snow, and life will start all over again.

X163.name: Winter Prayer
X163.description: The wind sends the scent of spring. The birds rest among the trees. A small wish germinates in Debbie's heart.

X164.name: Treasures from Winter
X164.description: The bond of blood has never been severed by geography. They believe that spring will eventually come.

X165.name: Early Childhood
X165.description: An unworldly genius is like a diamond in the rough, but tender wings will one day become full-fledged.

X166.name: Cool Breeze Fan
X166.description: The first design Fu Su completed in the Ancient Pavilion is a simple fan, its utility being the biggest highlight.

X167.name: Bottle of Brewed Dew
X167.description: Master’s assignments are unpredictable, for example, to learn the pharmacopoeia and brew dew throughout the summer.

X168.name: Fresh Plum Blossom
X168.description: On the day Fu Su learns to make dew tea, his design is finally finished. He presents his work with a bamboo.

X169.name: White Lotus
X169.description: The bright moon hangs in the sky. Beside the pond full of blooming lotus, two girls are putting lanterns on water.

X170.name: Jade Lotus
X170.description: In the box lies a dangling lotus ornament. The two young girls put make-up for each other.

X171.name: Ink Memory
X171.description: The two girls spent their picturesque teenage years together. They have never thought of separating.

X172.name: Silken Memories
X172.description: The girl completes the unfinished paintings, adding flowers and two blue birds. She couldn't stop missing her friend.
